title: Silicone Spoonula in Red
description: Bakers will get to every sweet drop of delicious batters and sauces with the Cake Boss Novelty Tools 11-1/2 in. "Devoted To Dessert" Silicone Spoonula. The flexible, rubberized head of this colorful Spoonula features the phrase "Devoted To Dessert" in hip lettering to bring more fun and pleasure to baking. It’s easy on nonstick surfaces and pliable enough to get into nooks and crannies. The Spoonula helps scrape every ounce of buttercream frosting, chocolate sauce and strawberry syrup out of bowls and pans. Designed with traditional beechwood loved by professional bakers, the handle resists heat, color and flavor absorption. Heat-safe to 450°F, the Spoonula works great for stirring caramel in a double boiler. Hand washing is recommended to preserve the handle’s finish. This fun Spoonula also works well with many other items in the Cake Boss collections and makes a great gift. Scrape every last bit of delicious batters, sauces and dough out of mixing bowls and pans using the Cake Boss Novelty Tools 11-1/2 in. "Devoted To Dessert" Silicone Spoonula.Colorful, sturdy silicone spoonula features the phrase "Devoted To Dessert" in retro-cool letteringFlexible, rubberized head is easy on nonstick surfaces and pliable enough to get into nooks and cranniesCrafted with traditional beechwood loved by professional bakers, the handle resists heat, color and flavor absorptionHand washing is recommended to preserve the handle’s finishHeat safe to 450°F
